I am an Assistant Professor at the
Federal University of São Carlos.
I have a B.A. in statistics from
University of São Paulo, 
a B.A. in law from 
Pontifícia Universidade Católica in São Paulo, and
a Ph.D. in statistics from 
Carnegie Mellon University.
I am currently a member of the
Scientific Council of the
Brazilian Association of Jurimetrics,
an associate investigator at NeuroMat and
a member of the Order of Attorneys of Brazil.

## Research interests

- Bayesian Inference
- Computational Historical Linguistics
- Decision Theory
- Jurimetrics (applications of statistics to law)
- Machine Learning
